body_html:
OK, there is an easy solution to this problem. Simply construct the variable with

mult_val = tf.Variable(tf.sparse_tensor_dense_matmul(test_sparse, v), validate_shape=False)

I'm leaving this open though, because I still don't see why sparse_tensor_dense_matmul should return a tensor with unspecified shape.

body:
OK, there is an easy solution to this problem. Simply construct the variable with

```
mult_val = tf.Variable(tf.sparse_tensor_dense_matmul(test_sparse, v), validate_shape=False)
```

I'm leaving this open though, because I still don't see why sparse_tensor_dense_matmul should return a tensor with unspecified shape.
